articles.title: Ariana DeBose's Mom Gina Dies at 57 from Ovarian Cancer: 'She Was My Favorite Person' - AOL.com
articles.description: Ariana DeBose’s mother Gina died at age 57 on Aug. 17, "due to complications with stage 3 ovarian cancer," the Oscar winner announced: "I couldn’t be more proud of her and how she fought this insidious disease over the past three years."
